mount.information: You can move the mount introducing the RADEC coordinates or the target name

ccd.title: CCD
ccd.information_exp: The exposure time is the time that camera's shutter is open. The longer is open, more objects can be seen.
ccd.information_filter: Filters are used by amateurs to enhance the details of celestial objects. Professional astronomers use them in order to understand the astrophysics.

messages.time_text: Set the exposure time in seconds
messages.main_ccd: Click here to select the main ccd
messages.secondary_ccd: Click here to select the secondary ccd
